formattedAddress: 555 W 38th St, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 555 W 38th St, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: We absolutely love our experience living at Lyra. The building is brand new, well-maintained and has great amenities including a gym and rooftop with stunning views of NYC, as well as a golf simulator that my partner really enjoys. The best part however, is the wonderful team that works here. Everyone is amazing, always smiling and welcoming. They all go the extra mile to make you feel special. I highly recommend the building.

text.text: We absolutely love our experience living at Lyra. The building is brand new, well-maintained and has great amenities including a gym and rooftop with stunning views of NYC, as well as a golf simulator that my partner really enjoys. The best part however, is the wonderful team that works here. Everyone is amazing, always smiling and welcoming. They all go the extra mile to make you feel special. I highly recommend the building.

originalText.text: Have been living in this building for 6 months now. I would say the building and the facilities are really nice. I also love the river view and city view. The staffs are also very helpful and friendly. The only two things are why it’s so dusty in the apartments when windows are shut all the time? I can see a layer of thick dust on the surface if haven’t cleaned for only 3 days. Even when I already have 3 air purifiers. The other thing is the transportation and neighborhood: only 7th train, a horse stable that smells across the street.

originalText.text: We loooove Lyra! I worked with Christopher S. from the leasing team - who was super friendly, informative & was really understanding of my situation (I recently moved from Canada, so did not have all the typical documents & accounts available). He guided us every step of the way and answered a million phone calls from me! The staff here overall are amazing! The front desk is always super kind & are always there to help you. The units here are also top notch - truly luxurious, and really well maintained.

text.text: We loooove Lyra! I worked with Christopher S. from the leasing team - who was super friendly, informative & was really understanding of my situation (I recently moved from Canada, so did not have all the typical documents & accounts available). He guided us every step of the way and answered a million phone calls from me! The staff here overall are amazing! The front desk is always super kind & are always there to help you. The units here are also top notch - truly luxurious, and really well maintained.

originalText.text:
Update: Now one of the two elevators to higher floors, which I got stuck, is out - for 3 weeks. And of course the management is dead silent about the issue. Be aware that it takes ages to come up or go down every time. Yet they emailed residents to give a 5 star review on google map? Ridiculous

Elevator is not safe, which makes it even worse that there are so many units high up. I was stuck in the elevator and it even dropped for couple of feet. The elevator has no phone connection, so had to wait in fear for 20 mins, on 41st floor!!!! for someone to take me out. And the building is not responding to any of my complaints. I loved the building and staffs but leasing office is not responsive with this issue, not explaining what the reason or remedial action would be.

originalText.text: I just toured the Lyra with my clients who are looking for apartments. We were all impressed by the quality, view and the service of the leasing team. The river view and city view are great. It is about 7 mins walk from the 7 train station and the shoppingmalls. They are offering  one month free, gvien what the price is this summer, it is a decent deal. RockRose is a very reliable group and their buildings in long island city have great reputation.
